description.english: Shoot the robber in the legs, tie their hands, and hand them off to police
description.german: Schieße dem Räuber in die Beine, fessle seine Hände und übergebe ihn der Polizei

description.schinese: 射击强盗的腿，绑住双手并交给警察
description.russian: Выстрелите грабителю в ноги, свяжите его и передайте полиции
description.japanese: 強盗の足を撃ち、手を縛って警察に引き渡す
description.polish: Postrzel rabusia w nogę, zwiąż go i oddaj policji
description.dutch: Schiet de rover in de benen, bind hem vast en lever hem bij de politie in
description.hungarian: Lődd lábon a rablót, kösd meg, és add át a rendőrségnek
description.turkish: Soyguncunun bacağına ateş et, ellerini bağla ve polise teslim et
description.arabic: أطلق النار على ساق اللص، اربطه وسلمه للشرطة
description.brazilian: Acerte a perna de um ladrão, amarre-o e entregue-o à polícia

description.dutch: Koop de bankauto om geldautomaten te plaatsen en geld te vervoeren
